articles.title: Congratulations to PM of Niger
articles.content:
Congratulations to PM of Niger
Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Monday sent a congratulatory message to Brigi Rafini upon his reappointment as prime minister and head of government of the Republic of Niger.
					 The message wished him greater success in his responsible work for the country's socio-economic development and expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger.
					
					 On the same day, DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong sent a similar message to Ibrahim Yacouba upon his appointment as minister of Foreign Affairs, Cooperation and African Integration and Nigeriens Abroad.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Congolese PM
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Congolese PM
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Clement Mouamba on his appointment as the prime minister of the Republic of Congo.
					 The message wished him good health and happiness and great success in his responsible work, expressing belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the interests of the peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: Greetings to Polish FM
articles.content:
Greetings to Polish FM
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Witold Waszczykowski, foreign minister of Poland, on its national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would develop on good terms in mutual interests of the peoples of the two countries and wished the Polish foreign minister success in his work for developing the country's foreign relations.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- The participants in the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun Tuesday.
					 They paid tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in the hall.
					
					 They made bows to the great leader who lie in state in the halls of immortality.
					
					 They went round with keen interest the halls where orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls which house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- The participants of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Tuesday.
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, pioneers of the cause of Juche-based revolutionary party building and eternal leaders of the WPK and the Korean revolution, in boundless reverence for them and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Senior Party, State, Army Officials Visit Lodging Quarters of Participants in WPK Congress
articles.content:
Senior Party, State, Army Officials Visit Lodging Quarters of Participants in WPK Congress
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- Senior party, state and army officials Tuesday visited the lodging quarters of the participants in the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Senior party, state and army officials Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Choe Thae Bok, Pak Yong Sik, Yang Hyong Sop, Kwak Pom Gi, O Su Yong, Kim Phyong Hae and Kim Yong Chol and officials of party and armed forces organs visited the lodging quarters to meet the participants.
					
					 They referred to the fact that all service personnel and people of the DPRK have waged a dynamic struggle for the final victory in building a thriving socialist nation, registering special events and achievements by leaps and bounds one after another under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They called on all the participants to play a vanguard role in the drive to implement the idea and line of the Party in the future, too, bearing deep in mind the undying exploits the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu performed for the founding and development of the Party.

articles.title: Press Conference Called to Disclose Truth of Group Abduction Case
articles.content:
Press Conference Called to Disclose Truth of Group Abduction Case
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- Nearly one month ago, the south Korean regime abducted in group women employees of the DPRK, who were working at a restaurant in Zhejiang Province of China, and took them to south Korea.
					 In this regard, fellows of those abductees and their families called a press conference here on Tuesday to disclose the truth of the case.
					
					 Present there were home and foreign reporters and overseas compatriots.
					
					 Statements were made at the conference by Choe Rye Yong, Jang Su Ryon, Sin Song A, Ri Mi Song and Han Yun Hui, who were DPRK employees of the restaurant run in Ningbo City, Zhejiang Province of China, and witnessed the case.
					
					 All of them contended that the case was a carefully premeditated, organized allurement and abduction by the south Korean puppet clique.
					
					 According to them, agents of south Korea's Intelligence Service (IS) bribed the chief of the restaurant, who was greedy and engaged only in immoral life, in order to carry into practice their group abduction scheme.
					
					 In mid-March, the bribed chief told his employees that the restaurant would move to the other country at an instruction of the ruling office.
					
					 On April 5, some strangers arrived there with a bus and told that they were to leave for service at a new restaurant.
					
					 Choe, one of those employees, happened to hear that the chief called one of the strangers "team leader of IS", who had frequently met with the former. Feeling a critical situation, she told the others to escape from the spot.
					
					 After all, the abductors ran away in a great hurry on the bus with employees already aboard.
					
					 Before putting their plot into practice, the IS agents gathered passports of the employees in advance for exit formalities and cleared all formalities for their departure with already prepared south Korean passports. And they took the abductees on an airplane for Seoul.
					
					 When the abductees noticed after boarding that they were destined for south Korea and had a row to get off the plane, the agents and the chief deceived them by telling they were on a "special mission" to be carried out in south Korea.
					
					 Then, questions were put by reporters.
					
					 Choe Rye Yong, Ri Mi Song, Sin Song A and Kim Yun Hui told reporters that the south Korean regime's assertion about "group defection from the north at free will" is a sheer fabrication. And they stressed that Jon Ok Hyang, Ryu Song Yong and all other fellows were taken in by the south Korean puppet group and they have had strong feelings of love for their parents and brothers and sisters and socialist homeland.
					
					 They went on to say:
					
					 Those abductees have been reportedly staging a hunger strike in demand of their immediate repatriation, despite the persistently forced "allegiance", and some of them are in a critical condition after falling in a faint. We are eager to cut the south Korean puppet group to pieces.
					
					 Nobody will go for oneself to cursed south Korea where gangsters run amuck, firing tear gas and water cannon at the families of victims to the Ferry Sewol disaster demanding a probe into the accident.
					
					 Then, statements were made by mothers of abductees Ri Ji Ye, Jon Ok Hyang, Pak Ok Byol, Ri Pom and Han Haeng Bok.
					
					 Expressing their surging wrath at the Park Geun Hye's group of traitors, they said: Our daughters have grown up in happiness with nothing to envy under the loving care of the DPRK, that's why, we say it is a whopping lie that they "yearned after" south Korea, a living hell.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group is forcing "defection" on them kept in solitary rooms, the mothers pointed out, urging it to allow them to meet their beloved daughters at once.
					
					 The families of abductees and witnesses contended that the case of "group defection from the north" is aimed to divert elsewhere the sentiment of the south Korean public critical of the "government".
					
					 Refuting the south Korean regime's assertion that parents of abductees belong to the "high-ranking" stratum and enjoy "special treatment", they said that all occupations are equally honorable in the DPRK and that the puppet group is turning black into white for confrontation with fellow countrymen and plot-breeding.
					
					 The Park group is going foolish in a bid to break the single-minded unity of the DPRK through such base and crude farce, the speakers said, adding they will struggle for the return of those abductees.
					
					 They condemned the south Korean regime's hideous unethical act and urged it to unconditionally accept the parents' just demand for reunion with their abducted daughters. And they ardently called upon all those present at the conference to join in their struggle. S

articles.title: Establishment of Fishing Control System Underway in DPRK
articles.content:
Establishment of Fishing Control System Underway in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- The establishment of a fishing control system between control centers at fishery stations and fishing boats is now underway in the DPRK.
					 The system makes possible the rapid exchange of marine information between them.
					
					 Experts say that the system would be conducive to putting fishing on a more scientific basis.

articles.title: Improved Model of "Jipsam" Bus Manufactured
articles.content:
Improved Model of "Jipsam" Bus Manufactured
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- The Chongjin Bus Factory in the DPRK recently manufactured an improved model of "Jipsam" bus in the ongoing 70-day campaign.
					 According to Choe Yang Rok, manager of the factory, the bus is more advantageous than the former in type, color and technical indices.
					
					 The 37-seat bus has a camera for rearview together with air-conditioning system and other installations to ensure safety in service and meet the convenience of passengers.

articles.title: Anti-"government" Actions Launched in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-"government" Actions Launched in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- Large-scale actions of workers were waged across south Korea on May Day to denounce the unpopular labor rule of the Park Geun Hye group of traitors and win the right to labor.
					 The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) launched the "2016 meeting for world labor day" and demonstrations in 15 areas of south Korea including Seoul.
					
					 Attending the rally held in Seoul were workers of the KCTU and members of organizations including the Federation of Peasants Associations, more than 50 000 in all.
					
					 Speakers said that the KCTU would submit bills reflecting the will of the workers to the 20th "National Assembly" and launch large-scale general strike and all-out action for realizing the vital right early in July.
					
					 They noted that the KCTU would not stop an action till the "five-point demand" is met.
					
					 They demanded the authorities scrap the evil laws of labor and "double guidelines" and set free the workers detained including the chairman of the KCTU.
					
					 That day the south Korean Federation of Trade Unions held a rally at Seoul Square with the attendance of more than 50 000 workers.
					
					 It demanded the "government" stop at once the retrogressive revision of the labor law and take measures for the vital rights of the workers.

articles.title: S. Korean Bodies Denounce Authorities for Backing Conservative Forces' Reckless Acts
articles.content:
S. Korean Bodies Denounce Authorities for Backing Conservative Forces' Reckless Acts
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress, the Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps, the Institute for National Studies and other civic and public organizations of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on April 29 at which they lashed out at the south Korean authorities for abetting the conservative forces' reckless acts.
					 Speakers there disclosed the fact that ultra-right conservative bodies including the "Oboi Yonhap" obstructed the anti-"government" struggle of the organizations from across the spectrum.
					
					 A press release was read out.
					
					 Great irony was the behavior of the present regime making desperate efforts to save the power from collapsing after facing the punishment of the people in the election, the release said, calling upon the "National Assembly" to probe the truth behind the illegal acts through investigation into the state policy.
					
					 Park Geun Hye should accept the people's mindset manifested in the NA election and immediately stop the behaviors against democracy, people's livelihood, peace and reunification, it added.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Calls for Intensifying Labor Movement
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Calls for Intensifying Labor Movement
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People Monday in an editorial called for intensifying the labor movement for protecting vital rights.
					 Referring to the struggle of workers staged in south Korea on Sunday for vital rights, the editorial said:
					
					 It is quite natural for trade unions to turn out in the actions against the authorities' moves for the retrogressive revision of the labor law.
					
					 The editorial expected that the Confederation of Trade Unions would turn out in the dynamic struggle against sacrifices of workers and the retrogressive revision of the labor law and for the restructuring of plutocrats full of confidence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in France
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in France
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Front of France published Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Making Selfless, Devoted Efforts for the Good of the People Is the Mode of Existence and Source of Invincible Might of the Workers' Party of Korea" in pamphlet at the Democrate Publishing House on April 27 on the occasion of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The work, published on October 10, Juche 104 (2015), says that the history of the WPK is the proud course in which it has taken responsible care of the people and led the Korean revolution to victory under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed Abroad
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- Events were held in different countries and by an international organization on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 They included the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition in China, lecture and Korean book, photo and handicrafts exhibition in Finland and Peru and meetings in South Africa and by the Women's International Democratic Federation between April 11 and 15.
					
					 Displayed in the venues of the events were photos dealing with the revolutionary careers and exploits of the President and leader Kim Jong Il and revolutionary activities of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 On display there were their works, books and photos introducing the true picture of the DPRK and handicrafts associated with the Korean people's creative talents and Kimilsungias and Kimjongilias.
					
					 The chairman of the Finnish Communists' League praised the President, father of socialist Korea, as distinguished thinker and theoretician and great leader of the global socialist movement as he founded the Juche idea and indicated the way for not only the Korean people but also progressive mankind.
					
					 The president of the Women's International Democratic Federation                 and members of its leadership praised President Kim Il Sung and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk for performing feats for the sacred cause for the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held in Finland.

articles.title: Day of Sun Praised by Syrian, British Newspapers
articles.content:
Day of Sun Praised by Syrian, British Newspapers
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- Syrian and British newspapers carried articles praising President Kim Il Sung on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 The Syrian newspaper Al Baath on April 14 said in an article titled "People's Korea celebrates birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung" that the Korean people were praising the President as the sun, adding that this is an expression of the noble respect to the great man who performed big feats in liberating Korea and accomplishing independence and development.
					
					 The newspaper said that the President made a great contribution to the cause of anti-imperialist independence and that the exploits he performed in the world national liberation struggle in colonies will be cherished by progressive mankind.
					
					 The Syrian newspaper Al Nour on April 13 in an article titled "104th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung" said that the President was so concerned about the improvement of the people's living standard while making ceaseless journey of field guidance.
					
					 It noted that the President who provided new school uniforms to all students across the country was very pleased to see the schoolchildren wearing new school uniforms and took their photos.
					
					 The British newspaper The New Worker on April 8 said in an article titled "In congratulation of birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung" that the President who was a political statesman in the 20th century energetically led the global socialist movement.
					
					 The April-May issue of the British newspaper Proletarian in an article titled "Socialist Korea unyielding to the sanctions and threats of the imperialism" condemned the U.S. for cooking up the "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK by abusing the UNSC while taking issue with the DPRK's satellite launch.

articles.title: Brazilian Body Introduces Healthcare in DPRK
articles.content:
Brazilian Body Introduces Healthcare in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea posted an article titled "Universal, free healthcare in DPRK is most advantageous one" on its website on April 25.
					 The article said:
					
					 The government of the DPRK, which had published during the Fatherland Liberation War the decision on enforcing the universal, free healthcare unprecedented in the world history of healthcare, stipulated free healthcare as one of the basic rights of its citizens in its Socialist Constitution.
					
					 Everybody in the DPRK receives equal medical treatment regardless of age, residence and job thanks to the well-regulated healthcare system such as healthcare networks for children and women and Koryo medical service network operating across the country.
					
					 Not only all forms of medical service including outpatient treatment, hospital treatment and doctor's visit but also fees for medical checkup, lab work, functional diagnosis and operation are all free of charge. Even expenses for return-trip to sanatoria are paid by the state or cooperative bodies.
					
					 Section doctor system is in force, whereby doctors visit inhabitants and healthcare workers are dedicating themselves to patients.
					
					 Thanks to nationwide telemedicine based on latest technology even patient far away from Pyongyang receive quick treatment with the help of able medical staff in the capital city.

articles.title: DPRK Introduced by Russian Media
articles.content:
DPRK Introduced by Russian Media
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- The Eastern Siberian Publishing House of Irkutsk Region of Russia posted an article titled "Self-development of DPRK" on its website on April 21 in the run-up to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The article said:
					
					 The word "self-development" is often heard from the DPRK these days.
					
					 It means the power which makes oneself strong.
					
					 The DPRK's self-development is based on the Juche idea.
					
					 The Juche idea which was founded by President Kim Il Sung and developed by Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il means, in a word, the idea that man is the master of his own destiny and has the capacity to hew out it.
					
					 The Korean people have advanced the revolution and construction, guided by the Juche idea.
					
					 One must not forget that the Korean people have achieved all victories and successes entirely by their own efforts despite the ceaseless blockade and sanctions of the U.S. and its followers.
					
					 The Korean people are by no means the one yielding to sanctions or pressure.
					
					 They are such people who make redoubled efforts as the outside forces increase pressure upon the DPRK and give fuller rein to the spirit of self-reliance and fortitude as the situation gets difficult.
					
					 The Korean people holding aloft the banner of self-development-first principle will surely accomplish the cause of building a thriving nation by their own efforts and with their own technology and resources.

articles.title: British Organizations Voice Solidarity with S. Korean People's Actions
articles.content:
British Organizations Voice Solidarity with S. Korean People's Actions
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK made public a joint statement on April 20 on the occasion of the 56th anniversary of the April 19 Popular Uprising in south Korea.
					 Referring to the significance of the popular uprising in opening a new chapter in the south Korean people's struggle for independence, democracy and national reunification, the statement said:
					
					 The spirit of the popular uprising lives on.
					
					 South Korea is still groaning under the corrupt dictatorship.
					
					 Though 50 odd years have passed since the popular uprising, the U.S. imperialists are still present in south Korea where the puppet fascist regime reigns.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye fascist regime should be brought down and the U.S. imperialists be driven out of south Korea through the second or third April 19 Uprising.
					
					 We voice firm solidarity with the south Korean people in their struggle for independence, democracy and national reunification.

articles.title: Japanese Body Protests against Authorities' Persecution of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Japanese Body Protests against Authorities' Persecution of Koreans in Japan
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- The Japan Committee for the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea on April 19 issued a statement in denunciation of the Japanese authorities' persecution of Korean residents in Japan.
					 The statement recalled that shortly after a great quake jolted the Kumamoto area, wild rumors stirring up bitterness towards Koreans were afloat in Japan at the tacit connivance of the Japanese government and under its patronage while nonsensical articles claiming that "Koreans in Kumamoto poisoned wells" were posted on websites.
					
					 It hit out at the government's move to suspend the payment of subsidies to the Korean schools.
					
					 It noted that the committee will struggle for checking the government's outrageous moves and boost the ties with the Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Preparations for Celebrating 7th Congress of WPK Underway Worldwide
articles.content:
Preparations for Celebrating 7th Congress of WPK Underway Worldwide
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- Brisk preparations for significantly celebrating the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) are now under way in the DPRK and worldwide.
					 As soon as the decision of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK on convening the congress was announced late in October last year, political parties, organizations and personages of different countries made public statements hailing it.
					
					 Honorary titles and certificates of exploits are being conferred upon the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu by Peru, Bangladesh and other countries in the run-up to the congress.
					
					 Preparatory committees were formed one after another in many countries such as Russia, Romania, Germany and Nigeria and by the international and regional bodies such as the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain and the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions.
					
					 Seminars, lectures, book and photo exhibitions and other diverse events are taking place to celebrate the congress with splendor under the sponsorship of the preparatory committees chaired by prominent figures of governments, political parties and organizations.
					
					 International solidarity activities to support the just cause of the party and people of the DPRK are being conducted in the run-up to the Seventh Congress of the WPK in response to the appeal of the 20th seminar of political parties of the world on building a new society.
					
					 Foreign media are giving wide publicity to the policies and lines of the WPK and their validity and vitality and the successes made in the 70-day campaign of loyalty.

articles.title: Preparatory Committee for Congratulating WPK on Its 7th Congress Formed by Syrian Communist Party (Unified)
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee for Congratulating WPK on Its 7th Congress Formed by Syrian Communist Party (Unified)
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the Syrian Communist Party (Unified) for congratulating the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on its 7th Congress was formed on April 27.
					 The general secretary of the party was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to accounts of the 7th Congress of the WPK through Al Nour, organ of the party, and hold various events.

articles.title: Cuadros directivos visitan alojamiento de participantes en VII Congreso de PTC
articles.content:
Cuadros directivos visitan alojamiento de participantes en VII Congreso de PTC
Pyongyang, 3 de mayo (ACNC) -- Los cuadros directivos del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito visitaron el dia 3 el alojamiento de los participantes en el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Choe Thae Bok, Pak Yong Sik, Yang Hyong Sop, Kwak Pom Gi, O Su Yong, Kim Phyong Hae, Kim Yong Chol y los funcionarios de los organismos del Partido y las fuerzas armadas se reunieron con los participantes.
					
					Los visitantes se refirieron a que todos los militares y civiles coreanos se han esforzado mucho por alcanzar la victoria final en la construccion de un Estado socialista logrando de manera multiple y sucesiva los eventos especiales y los exitos sorprendentes bajo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Enfatizaron en que en el futuro tambien los participantes deberan cumplir un papel vanguardista en los trabajos para materializar la idea y los lineamientos del Partido, guardando en lo profundo del corazon las imperecederas proezas de los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu realizadas en la fundacion y el desarrollo del Partido.

articles.title: Participantes en VII Congreso de PTC rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Participantes en VII Congreso de PTC rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 3 de mayo (ACNC) -- Los participantes en el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea visitaron el dia 3 el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan.
					Ellos rindieron el sublimen homenaje a los grandes Lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il ante sus estatuas de pie y en los salones de eternidad donde estan conservados los cuerpos de estos grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu.
					
					Luego, pasaron revista a las salas de conservacion de las ordenes y las otras de conservacion de carros, coche electrico, barco y vagones de tren usados por los grandes Lideres antecesores hasta el ultimo periodo de la vida revolucionaria para las visitas de orientacion y los viajes por otros paises.

articles.title: Conferencia de prensa para revelar verdad de secuestro a ciudadanas de RPDC
articles.content:
Conferencia de prensa para revelar verdad de secuestro a ciudadanas de RPDC
Pyongyang, 3 de mayo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 3 en esta capital una rueda de prensa con las empleadas y las familiares de victimas para denunciar el secuestro colectivo a las ciudadanas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea por parte de los titeres surcoreanos. 
					Asistieron ahi los reporteros nacionales y extranjeros, los miembros de las representaciones diplomaticas acreditadas en la RPDC, y los compatriotas que estan de visita en la patria socialista. 
					
					Ante todo, hicieron uso de la palabra Choe Rye Yong, Jang Su Ryon, Sin Song A, Ri Mi Song y Han Yun Hui, empleadas del restaurante que se gestionaba en Ningbo de la provincia china de Zhejiang. 
					
					Siendo testigos del presente caso, expresaron gran indignacion por la barbaridad de los titeres surcoreanos que secuestraron a plena luz del dia a sus queridas amigas y las llevaron al Sur de Corea, infierno humano, y revelaron que el presente caso es el crimen premeditado y organizado por los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					Los agentes del Servicio de Inteligencia del Sur de Corea comenzaron a poner en practica el plan de secuestro colectivo con el soborno con dinero al jefe del restaurante que perseguia una vida lujosa e inmoral. 
					
					A mediados de marzo pasado, este tipejo instigado por los agentes del Servicio de Inteligencia, dijo a las empleadas que se gestionara pronto nuevo restaurante en otro pais segun la orden del superior. 
					
					Las empleadas hicieron los preparativos de mudanza sin tener ninguna sospecha. 
					
					El 5 de abril pasado, cuando las empleadas estaban haciendo los preparativos segun la palabra del jefe, algunos hombres desconocidos vinieron con un autobus por la puerta trasera y llevaron a las empleadas al autobus insistiendo en la necesidad de prestar el servicio movil en el nuevo restaurante. 
					
					La empleada Choe Rye Yong vio por casualidad con sus propios ojos que el jefe del restaurante se mostraba servil ante un hombre llamandolo como "jefe de grupo del Servicio de Inteligencia". 
					
					El jefe del restaurante lo conocia desde cuando gestionaba el restaurante en Yanji. 
					
					Choe dijo a sus colegas que no montaron todavia el autobus a huirse y salio junto con ellas por la puerta delantera. 
					
					Los agentes del Servicio de Inteligencia ya tenian los pasaportes de las secuestradas y terminaron los tramites previos de salida del pais. 
					
					E hicieron los tramites de salida con los pasaportes surcoreanos ya preparados y llevaron a las secuestradas a Seul a bordo de avion. 
					
					Despues de tomar el avion, las secuestraron se dieron cuenta de que el avion iba al Sur de Corea. Ellas protestaron a bajar del avion. Entonces, los agentes del Servicio de Inteligencia y el jefe del restaurante les enganaron diciendo que "calmense las ignorantes" y que "ustedes van al Sur de Corea para cumplir una 'mision especial'". 
					
					Nunca es tolerable este tremendo crimen cometido por los titeres surcoreanos con el metodo mas barbaro y grosero. 
					
					Luego, respondieron a las preguntas de los periodistas. 
					
					Choe Rye Yong, Ri Mi Song, Sin Song A y Kim Yun Hui subrayaron que son mentiras completamente falsificadas los disparates de la banda titere sobre la "fuga colectiva" y la "voluntad libre" y anadieron que Jon Ok Hyang y Ryu Song Yong y otras sus amigas enganadas y llevadas al Sur de Corea por los enemigos, aman mucho a sus padres y hermanos y la patria socialista.
					
					 Segun trascendidos, esas victimas de la barbaridad de tentacion y secuestro ayunan demandando fuertemente devolverlas a la patria sin doblegarse ante las perversas maniobras de la banda titere surcoreana que les obliga la "sumision" y estan desmayadas, destacaron y expresaron sus sentimientos de matar a sablazos la pandilla titere surcoreana.
					
					 Apuntaron que nadie quiere ir voluntariamente al odioso suelo surcoreano donde reinan los gangsteres que lanzaban hasta la bomba lacrimogena y el canon de agua contra los padres que demandaban el esclarecimiento de los verdaderos aspectos del caso de hundimiento del ferry Sewol que produjo la masacre de sus hijos en el Sur de Corea.
					
					  A continuacion, dijeron las madres de las victimas Ri Ji Ye, Jon Ok Hyang, Pak Ok Pyol, Ri Pom y Han Haeng Bok.
					
					  Ellas expresaron una gran indignacion a la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye diciendo que son mentiras puras las palabras de que "simpatizaron" por la sociedad surcoreana, infierno humano, sus hijas quienes crecieron gozando solo de la felicidad sin envidiar nada en el regazo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  Senalaron que la horda titere surcoreana les obliga la "sumision" a sus hijas encarcelandolas por separado en las celdas individuales y exigieron permitirle el encuentro directo con sus hijas como lo demandan los familiares.
					
					  Los padres de So Kyong A, Kim Sol Gyong, Pak Ok Byol, Ji Jong Hwa y Ri Ji Ye y otras victimas y las empleadas Choe Rye Yong, Han Yun Hui y Sin Song A revelaron que la banda titere invento el presente "incidente de fuga colectiva" con el objetivo de evitar el odio y la condena de la opinion publica del Sur de Corea.
					
					  Al referir al hecho de que la canalla titere insiste en que los padres de las victimas son los cuadros de "alto rango" y estas son las hijas de la capa que recibe el supuesto "tratamiento especial", condenaron que en la RPDC no hay oficios malos ni buenos y la banda titere, enloquecida por la confrontacion fratricida y el complot, convierte lo blanco en lo negro.
					
					  Denunciaron que la horda titere de Park Geun-hye actua absurdamente por destruir la unidad monolitica de la RPDC a traves de la vil y pueril farsa de rapto colectivo y subrayaron que lucharan con dinamismo por lograr el regreso de las victimas a la patria sin olvidarlas ni un momento.
					
					  Condenaron el acto malvado antihumanitario sin precedentes de la banda titere de Park Geun-hye, destacaron que hay que aceptar incondicionalmente la demanda justa de los familiares de reunirse con sus hijas y exhortaron ardientemente a todos los participantes a tomar parte en la lucha por materializarlo.

articles.title: Publicada en Francia obra de Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Publicada en Francia obra de Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, 3 de mayo (ACNC) -- Con motivo del VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Frente Antiimperialista de Francia publico en folleto el 27 de abril en la Editorial Democrate la obra del Mariscal Kim Jong Un "Servirles a las masas populares con entera disposicion es el modo de la existencia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y la fuente de su poderio indestructible".
					El trabajo publicado el 10 de octubre del 104 (2015) de la Era Juche se refiere a que la historia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea deviene una trayectoria orgullosa en que bajo la direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, condujo a la victoria la Revolucion Coreana encargandose del destino del pueblo.
